1: <pb/>A ton is listail eb yinatil eb titnak bay Judá ti', a ton eb max ilaytok yuj cham Nabucodonosor reyal Babilonia, max lajwi tiempoal yayji ec' eb yin presoal bay tu', max meltzojtok eb bay Jerusalén, c'al bay juntzanxa lugar yul yet Judá. Junjunc'al max apni oc bay is conobal, ikbabil eb yuj eb ti': Zorobabel, Josué, Nehemías, Seraías, Reelaías, Mardoqueo, Bilsán, Mispar, Bigbai, Rehum c'al Baana.
6: <t>Eb yet Pahat-moab ma chi yal elapnok eb yet Josué c'al Joab, 2,812 eb.</t>
25: <t>Eb aj Quiriat-jearim, Cafira c'al yet Beerot, 743 eb.</t>
26: <t>Eb aj Ramá c'al aj Geba, 621 eb.</t>
28: <t>Eb aj Betel c'al eb aj Hai, 223 eb.</t>
33: <t>Eb aj Lod, Hadid c'al Ono, 725 eb.</t>
36: <t>Eb sacerdote eb yinatil Jedaías, a ton eb tu' is yinatil Josué, 973 eb.</t>
40: <t>Eb levita yinatil Josué, c'al eb yet Cadmiel, a eb tu' yinatil c'apax Hodavías eb, ay 74 eb.</t>
41: <t>Eb yinatil Asaf chi bitni, 128 eb yin masanil.</t>
42: <pb/>Eb taynem puerta a ton eb yinatil Salum, eb yet Ater, eb yet Talmón, eb yet Acub, eb yet Hatita c'al eb yet Sobai, 139 eb yin masanil.
43: <pb/>A eb chi ak'wi serbil bay templo, a ton eb yinatil Ziha, eb yet Hasufa, eb yet Tabaot,
44: eb yet Queros, eb yet Siaha, eb yet Padón,
45: eb yet Lebana, eb yet Hagaba, eb yet Acub,
46: eb yet Hagab, eb yet Salmai, eb yet Hanán,
47: eb yet Gidel, eb yet Gahar, eb yet Reaía,
48: eb yet Rezín, eb yet Necoda, eb yet Gazam,
49: eb yet Usa, eb yet Paseah, eb yet Besai,
50: eb yet Asena, eb yet Meunim, eb yet Nefusim,
51: eb yet Bacbuc, eb yet Hacufa, eb yet Harhur,
52: eb yet Bazlut, eb yet Mehida, eb yet Harsa,
53: eb yet Barcos, eb yet Sísara, eb yet Tema,
54: eb yet Nezía c'al yetok eb yet Hatifa.
55: <pb/>A mac ay yinatil eb max ak'on serbil cham Salomón, a ton eb yinatil Sotai, eb yet Soferet, eb yet Peruda,
56: eb yet Jaala, eb yet Darcón, eb yet Gidel,
57: eb yet Sefatías, eb yet Hatil, eb yet Poqueret-hazebaim, yetokc'al eb yet Amón.
58: A masanil eb chi ak'wi serbil bay templo, c'al yetok eb yinatil eb yak'omal serbil Salomón, ay 392 eb yin masanil.
59: <pb/>Ay 652 eb yinatil Delaía, Tobías c'al Necoda. Max tit eb bay Tel-mela, Tel-harsa, Querub, Adón c'al Imer. A eb tu', maj je' tx'oxon el ba eb tatol israel eb yuj yinatil, ma toc'al ay yuj ba eb.
61: <pb/>A eb yinatil Habaía, Cos c'al Barzilai max yal eb tol sacerdote eb, palta maj ilchaj junok un bay chi txecloji tatol yinatil eb sacerdote eb. Yuj tu' xan maj chalay oc eb yin opiso yin sacerdoteal. (A jun chi al-lay Barzilai-il tu', max nupay yetok is cutz'in jun cham aj Galaad chi yik Barzilai, xan a bi is ni' tu' max yikcan ajok.)
63: Max yal cham gobernador tol c'am chi lo eb loj tol yet Dios yayji ocok, masantac'al ok yal junok sat sacerdote tzet ok yun yelapnok yet ok yilon Urim c'al Tumim.
65: c'am chi oc eb nak mosejal c'al eb ix mosejal tz'akilok. A eb tu' ay 7,337 eb yin masanil, ay c'apax 200 eb winak c'al eb ix ix chi bitni.
66: Ay c'apax 736 no caballo c'al 245 no mula.
67: Ay c'apax 435 no camello, c'al 6,720 no burro.
68: <pb/>Ay juntzanok eb yajaw yayji xol eb yican. A yet max apni oc eb bay templo Jehová bay Jerusalén, max yak' eb is sabal yuj ca watx'nelay aj templo tu', bay ayic' yet payxa.
69: Max yak'on eb colwal yuj ca watx'nelay aj templo atac'ala' jantak tzet yetal ay yul k'ab eb. Max yak' eb 1,030 libra ch'en oro, ay c'apax 5,740 libra ch'en plata yetok 100 an jokan pichilej yet eb sacerdote.
70: <pb/>A eb sacerdote, eb levita, yetokc'al juntzan eb conob, chi yal elapnok eb chi bitni, eb taynem puerta, c'al eb chi ak'wi serbil bay templo max cajay bay is conob junjun. Max cajay c'apax juntzanxa eb bay is conob junjun.
